snippet.title: Black Myth: Wukong - Official Release Date Trailer | Game Awards 2023
snippet.description:
The Black Myth: Wukong release date is August 20, 2024 on PS5, Xbox Series X/S, and PC. Revealed at The Game Awards 2023, the Black Myth: Wukong release date trailer gives us another exciting look at the upcoming action-RPG rooted in Chinese mythology, developed and published by Game Science.
Based on Journey to the West, one of the four classical novels of Chinese literature, the game puts you in the shoes of the Destined One, challenging you to venture into a fascinating yet dangerous world. Master and combine different spells, weapons, and abilities to suit your combat style.
